title: IIT Kanpur Recruitment 2017 – Project Engineer & Mechanic Posts
text: Click here for Project Mechanic Post Details IIT Kanpur Recruitment 2017 – Project Engineer Posts : Indian Institute of Technology (IIT), Kanpur has advertised a notification for the recruitment of Project Engineer vacancies for two different projects on temporary & contract basis. Eligible candidates can apply in the prescribed application format on or before 15 & 25-02-2017. Other details like educational qualification & how to apply are given below… IIT Kanpur Vacancy Details: Total No of Posts: 03 Name of the Post: Project Engineer Name of the Project: 1. Centre for Excellence for Flexible Electronics: 01 Post 2. Development of a Super-elastic Friction Damper (SFD) for vibration control of pipelines: 02 Posts Educational Qualification : Candidates should possess M. Tech or B.Tech + 3 year experience in relevant field, have hands-on working experience with device fabrication, device characterization for S.No-1, Post Graduate (M. Tech) in Structural Engineering for S.No-2 Posts. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on applicants performance in test/ interview for S.No-1. How to Apply: For S.No-1: Eligible candidates can complete resume to scdt@iitk.ac.in with subject line as “PE for NCFlexE Project”on or before 15-02-2017. For S.No-2: Eligible candidates can send their application along with updated bio-data to Sudib Kumar Mishra, Principal Project Investigator, Department of Civil Engineering, Indian Institute of Technology Kanpur, Kanpur-208016 or mail to smishra@iitk.ac.in on or before 25-02-2017. Important Dates: Last Date for Receipt of Application for S.No-1: 15-02-2017. Last Date for Receipt of Application for S.No-2: 25-02-2017. For more details like duration of appointment, salary & other information click on the link given below…. Click here for Recruitment Advt for Post 2 IIT Kanpur Recruitment 2017 – Project Engineer Posts: Department of Aerospace Engineering, Indian Institute of Technology (IIT), Kanpur has issued a notification for the recruitment of Project Engineer vacancies for the project “Development of a 2D Axisymmetric Material Thermal Response Code for Ablative/ Non-ablative Thermal Protection System of Reentry Bodies” on temporary basis. Eligible candidates can apply in the prescribed application format on or before 23-02-2017. Other details like educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… IIT Kanpur Vacancy Details: Name of the Posts: Project Engineer Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Master of Technology in Aerospace Engineering. Selection Process: Only shortlisted candidates will be called for interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may send their applications on plain paper including the details of complete professional academic record (attach copies of certificates) and work experience to the Prof. Rakesh Kumar, Non-equilibrium Flow Simulation Lab, Aerospace Engineering Department on or before 23-02-2017. Last Date for Submission of Application: 23-02-2017. For more details like desirable qualification, experience, salary & other information click on the link given below…. Click here for Recruitment Advt – IIT Kanpur Recruitment 2017 – Project Mechanic Posts: Department of Electrical Engineering, Indian Institute of Technology (IIT), Kanpur has invited applications for the recruitment of Project Mechanic vacancies. Eligible candidates can apply in the prescribed application format on or before 28-02-2017 at 10:00 am. Other details like educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… IIT Kanpur Vacancy Details: Total No.of Posts: 01 Name of the Posts: Project Mechanic Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess High School, ITI (Mechanical) or High School with 5 years experience. Selection Process: Selection will be based on interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may send their applications by e-mail to Dr. P. Sensarma, sensarma@iitk.ac.in on or before 28-02-2017 at 10:00 am. Last Date for Submission of Applications: 28-02-2017 at 10:00 am. For more details like job description & other information click on the link given below….
